subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Coach Mike D’Antoni is leaving in his fourth season, with the Knicks on a six-game losing streak and his offensive system at odds with the style of play of the star player Carmelo Anthony.
snippet: Coach Mike D’Antoni is leaving in his fourth season, with the Knicks on a six-game losing streak and his offensive system at odds with the style of play of the star player Carmelo Anthony.
